sentence.Network_en: Please type or write clearly in double spacing on one side of A4 paper only.
sentence.Network_cn: 请用A4纸、以双倍行距单面打印或誊抄，字迹务必清晰。

sentence.Network_en: Shall I use single or double spacing when I type this letter?
sentence.Network_cn: 我打这封信是用单行行距还是用双行行距?

sentence.Network_en: Double spacing is required between two paragraphs.
sentence.Network_cn: 段与段之间通常采用双行距.
